author: pyang
msg: Revert the patch for HARMONY-2270([classlib][unit] tests.api.java.io.FileTest@test_mkdir failes on win XP) and HARMONY-2157([classlib][luni]not able to make a directory whose length is greater than 248), due to they caused VM crash on windows sometimes

author: pamarcelot
msg: Fixing a bug that caused the Attribute View to not reflect the real values of the selected entries after editing an attribute, selecting another entry and then coming back on the edited entry (Only the UI was updated, not the model)

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for JDBC Master Slave for MySQL for AMQ-1074 thanks to the kind patch from Steve Lotito

author: eglynn
msg: Replaced usage of snoop Handler in WS-A demo with demo-specific logging
formatter, to avoid JDK bug #6467808 which breaks the construction of the
SAAJ SOAPMessage when a (legal) repeated namespace is present.
